comment: /**  * Translate the given {@link HttpServletRequest} into a view name.  * @param request the incoming {@link HttpServletRequest} providing  * the context from which a view name is to be resolved  * @return the view name, or {@code null} if no default found  * @throws Exception if view name translation fails  */
code: /**  * Translate the given {@link HttpServletRequest} into a view name.  * @param request the incoming {@link HttpServletRequest} providing  * the context from which a view name is to be resolved  * @return the view name, or {@code null} if no default found  * @throws Exception if view name translation fails  */ @Nullable String getViewName(HttpServletRequest request) throws Exception.
